post.body: o rly? do tell...
hahahahahahahahahahahahaha. ha.
that. blows. *hug*
was up before noon today.... wait. what?
hahaha, Linkin Park never fails to make my day better <3
few items: need to stop being nocturnal/chicago plans just might work/Cleve Jones is the perfect man
when a man loves another man they give each other a special hug... from behind.
merh
hahahaha. the best story ever. *snickersnicker* so accurate. k. bedtime.
"It's not about money, it's about sending a message. Everything burns." <3
my sister is insane. the end.
is getting a roommate next semester when my favorite panda leaves... errrrr, interesting
CHRISTMAS!
has the most interesting conversations in the early morning, if he only knew... ><
got a B in psychology!!!!!! *weeps with joy*
so apparently my name was Sylvia the Warrior and God is a lesbian from small town Nebraska.....
yay for new Bird. yay even more for much needed discussions.
witnessed the birth of a lol cat, and it was glorious.
enjoys the days of peace and quiet, nothing like the guilty pleasure of crappy rock radio and a vampire novel ^__^
is pretty sure Reed is the man. period. done. forever. the end.
